Prism Song is a short & sweet DOS style platformer with unique ASCII art and mechanics. Set in a strange and dying world, take the form of 3 different avatars to serve the Prism! Use special moves to take down the King, the Queen, and the Dragon, and restore the Song! Will you spare them? Written in Batch + VBScript.

FEATURES

  • Minimalist ASCII art
  • 3 unique Avatars to play as, each with powerful special moves
  • 3 Bosses to destroy
  • Strange and surreal world
  • Commandline gameplay
  • Serene Soundtrack

CONTROLS

  • A and D : move left and right, changes direction to left and right respectively
  • S : center direction
  • W : jump in specified direction
  • I : change colour
  • O : special move
  • P : Interact with NPC's and buildings (totems, shrines, ect)

Unfortunately, this game is Windows 10 only, since it uses VT100 escape sequences.
